name: Nathan Kamenar
summary: Strategic Senior Full Stack Engineer with 9+ years of experience building scalable, production-grade web platforms using JavaScript-based frameworks and Python for AI-driven services. Deep expertise in Node.js, NestJS, and modern frontend frameworks for delivering high-performance, cloud-native applications. Proven experience integrating AI/ML pipelines via Python (FastAPI), designing event-driven microservices, and implementing CI/CD automation on AWS. Strong background in leading Agile teams, optimizing distributed systems, and bridging backend intelligence with intuitive frontend experiences using React and Next.js.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Architected and led the development of scalable backend platforms using Node.js, NestJS, and Express, designing modular microservices and API layers that supported high-throughput, low-latency enterprise systems.

Designed and deployed AI-enabled services using Python (FastAPI) to serve machine learning models for anomaly detection, forecasting, and analytics, reducing false positives and improving decision accuracy across data-driven workflows.

Built and maintained event-driven architectures using message queues and asynchronous processing patterns, significantly improving system scalability, fault tolerance, and inter-service communication efficiency.
Led cloud-native deployments on AWS (ECS, Lambda, S3, RDS, CloudFormation), implementing Infrastructure-as-Code and improving release consistency, environment parity, and deployment velocity.
Established and optimized CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker, enabling automated testing, security checks, and zero-downtime deployments while reducing manual release effort.

Developed responsive and high-performance frontend applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, integrating real-time data streams via WebSockets and REST APIs to deliver near-instant user feedback.
Implemented system-wide observability and monitoring using Prometheus, Grafana, and structured logging, achieving high availability and proactive alerting for production workloads.
Collaborated closely with data science teams to productionize ML models, exposing them through REST and GraphQL APIs and ensuring seamless consumption by frontend applications and external partners.
Mentored engineers and contributed to architectural decision-making, code reviews, and Agile ceremonies, driving consistent engineering standards and long-term platform maintainability.
